abstract: 'To put it bluntly, I almost died.'
description: Samantha Van Zanen's story starts with a dramatic childbirth but mostly reflects on the darkest years of her life as she coped with having Turner's Syndrome. The bullying, needles and anguish were alleviated somewhat by her family and close friends.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002121; Hidden treasure : thoughts about living with Turner's Syndrome : Digital Storytelling project; Active; 2006
